title: Sundar Pichai - Wikipedia
snippet: Pichai was selected to become the next CEO of Google on August 10, 2015, after previously being appointed chief product officer by then CEO Larry Page. On October 24, 2015, he stepped into the new position at the completion of the formation of Alphabet Inc., the new holding company for the Google company family. He was appointed to the Alphabet Board of Directors in 2017. As of May 2025, his net worth is estimated at US$1.1 billion.

title: Google CEO Sundar Pichai: 2025 is going to be the biggest year for search ... - The Times of India
snippet: Sundar Pichai, CEO of Google, has announced that 2025 will be a landmark year for search innovation. During the company's recent earnings call, Pichai highlighted the transformative changes that Google Search will undergo, driven by advancements ...

title: Google CEO Pichai tells employees to gear up for big 2025: 'The stakes are high'
snippet: Google CEO Sundar Pichai told employees last week that "the stakes are high" for 2025, as the company faces increased competition and regulatory hurdles and contends with rapid advancements in artificial intelligence.

title: As AI wipes jobs, Google CEO Sundar Pichai says it’s up to everyday people to adapt accordingly | Fortune
snippet: December 2, 2025, 10:59 AM ET · Add us on · AI isn’t just coming for entry-level workers. Google CEO Sundar Pichai says no job, not even his own, is safe. But those who don’t adapt will be the first to fall.Jeenah Moon—Bloomberg/Getty ...
